text: Bendegúz Bóka (born 2 October 1993) is a Hungarian handballer for Balatonfüredi KSE and the Hungarian national team. He represented Hungary at the 2019 World Men's Handball Championship.2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster ==References== ==External links== * *Champsport.hu *Pickhandball.hu Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:People from Veszprém Category:SC Pick Szeged players
title: Bendegúz Bóka
